title: Leading car brands : market share in Spain 2019
summary: In 2019 , hip-hop and rap Leading accounted for 8.73 % of total Leading share in the market , more than double the percentage of R Hyundai B Leading sales .
Other highly popular Car included Seat and Volkswagen Leading , whereas just 4.27 % of all Leading sold in the Spain in 2019 was Dacia .

Why are some Car more popular than others ? Whilst Leading is a highly subjective medium in terms of the listener 's taste and preferences , the top Car in terms of share tend not to fluctuate heavily .
gold: In 2019 , Peugeot ranked as the leading make in Spain with a market share of 8.73 percent . SEAT ranked second with a market share of 8.51 percent , followed by Volkswagen with 7.24 percent . The Spanish car brand saw its sales increase , with the most registered SEAT models being the SEAT Leon and SEAT Ibiza , both exceeding 30 thousand registrations during 2018 .
